title: Logbook
blurb: Your personal space to reflect on experiences and emotions.
description: The Logbook makes journaling easier than ever, you don't have to log how are you feeling every day to know more about yourself, the Logbook makes it easy to track goals and moments that contributed to them, through a secure and private experience.

title: Bold CMS
blurb: The CMS that understands your content
description: Bold is a hosted, headless CMS SaaS application that empowers publishers to create, curate and distribute their content across modern devices and screens effortlessly through structured APIs using any technology stack.

title: Camera M 4.0
blurb: iOS camera app with DSLR functions
description: Camera M is a professional camera app with powerful manual controls similar to a DSLR camera, designed to achieve the highest image quality from iPhone and iPad cameras. Specializing in RAW and Depth photography, it is the best camera app your iPhone or iPad.

title: Tangerine for Android
blurb: Your guide to daily self-care
description: Tangerine is your guide to daily self-care. It allows you to form habits, track your mood and journal (journaling is only available on iOS right now, but is coming soon on Android).

title: Wing Receptionist
blurb: Finally, an affordable receptionist for your virtual office
description: https://getwingapp.com/forbusiness/receptionist?ref=producthunt will handle all of your business' calls - whether it's sales, being a receptionist, or customer support! We'll follow your processes, use your software, and make sure your customers are happy! Focus on your business, not on calls.

title: Birabo
blurb: An effortless real-time collaboration tool for teams
description: With Birabo, you will never lose your project files, notes, folders and links again. Share them with your team in one workspace, in real-time.

title: The Peak
blurb: Morning Brew for Canada
description: The Peak is a daily newsletter covering the latest business news from Bay Street to Beijing—and everywhere in between. We're making Canadian news fun in an informative and entertaining email that's everything you need to know to start your day. All in 5 mins.

title: Trimwire Observe
blurb: Free tool to track and manage SaaS expenses
description: Trimwire Observe is a free tool for tracking all of your software expenses. Observe will automatically map your Quickbooks or Xero transactions to products, giving you one cohesive view of your spend.

title: Mindfulmeets (for Google Meet)
blurb: Add emojis/GIFs, agendas, guest info & more to Google Meet
description: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.

title: Hearo
blurb: Full screen watch parties with smart TV tech and voice chat.
description: Laugh, talk, and cheer with friends while watching Netflix, YouTube, ESPN, and 20+ other channels and video services, like you're on a big couch together🍿. Hearo is Multiplayer TV: simply amazing full screen, HD-quality watch parties for phone and PC. 📺🥳

title: EasyClout
blurb: Social media management and growth platform
description: Easyclout is a powerful, simple, all-in-one social media management and growth platform that helps businesses reduce social media marketing costs with our state of the art AI bot. Saving you time, increase productivity, and achieve better business results.

title: Threadletter
blurb: Convert Revue newsletter to Twitter thread in seconds
description: Threadletter allows converting a Revue newsletter to a Twitter thread in seconds. Enter the Revue API key, select the issue, and publish the thread via Chirr App or copy-paste to Twitter.

title: Bubble Integration Plugins by Pathfix
blurb: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app, instantly
description: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.

title: Quick Calc
blurb: An elegant calculator for your menu bar.
description: Quick Calc is a simple and easy-to-use calculator which can be directly accessed from the menu bar with the click of a button.

title: Stylelist
blurb: Figma plugin for quick creation text and color styles
description: Create text and color styles in Figma faster and easier for your projects.

title: Queenly
blurb: YC W21 - Search engine and marketplace for formal dresses
description: Largest marketplace & search engine for the formalwear industry. We help every girl find the exact dream dress they’re looking for.

title: 365 & me
blurb: Journaling app with daily questions to reflect
description: 365 & me is a simple journaling app that helps you to get to know yourself better. Answer a question a day to reflect about your life, see how you change over the years and celebrate your achievements!

title: Stonksfolio
blurb: Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
description: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.

title: Onsite.fun
blurb: Virtual activities for remote teams
description: Onsite.fun is the perfect solution for companies to create and maintain camaraderie when working on a distributed basis. We developed group budgeting, centralized invoicing, recurrent activity bundles, and roles to make it seamless and efficient.

title: Lizard
blurb: Online card game for up to 6 players
description: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.

title: Pins for Pinboard
blurb: Modern iOS/macOS Pinboard app for 2021
description: Offline access to all Pinboard bookmarks. Filter with smart collections. Share extension, drag-and-drop, Shortcuts app. Widgets, Spotlight search, Handoff, multitasking.

title: Ojoy
blurb: Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality
description: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.

title: Blind Pulse
blurb: Workplace culture & sentiment ratings by verified employees
description: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.

title: Everse
blurb: Build professional websites instantly. Free starter sites.
description: Ready to use professional websites designed by UX experts for many business niches. https://deothemes.com/wordpress-themes/everse-multi-purpose-elementor-wordpress-theme/ is a tool that does the whole job for you. It includes a customizable WordPress theme, premium plugins, and niche-focused design templates.

title: We're Not Really Strangers
blurb: Card game & movement about empowering meaningful connections
description: Three carefully crafted levels of questions and wildcards that allow you to deepen your existing relationships and create new ones.

title: Sneak in Peace
blurb: Discover the latest Sneakers from around the world.
description: Sneak in Peace is an online destination to discover, shop, and collect the latest and most sought-after Men’s & Women’s Sneakers. At Sneak in Peace we source the most unique and exclusive Sneakers, including a huge selection of conscious, eco, and vegan brands

title: Wizza Theme
blurb: Dark theme for Visual Studio Code
description: Wizza is a dark theme for Visual Studio Code. The dark background provides a pleasant contrast. Specially optimized for HTML, CSS and Javascript coding. Wizza is forked from Night Owl and is inspired by One Dark Pro.

title: PowerFarm
blurb: Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
description: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.

title: Pillow 4.0
blurb: Sleeping better, made simple
description: Pillow is the best sleep tracker app for your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad to help you uncover the scientifically proven benefits of good sleep. Version 4.0 is a complete redesign and rewrite of the app, brining many new features and improvements.

title: GitWrapped
blurb: View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years
description: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020

title: Slowbug
blurb: Debug your code in slow-mo!
description: Slowbug is a VS Code extension for debugging your code in slow-mo! Slowbug makes it possible to see how the control flows through the code by running it slowly, at your preferred speed, line by line. I find it handy when working on a new codebase.

title: Duotone VS Code Theme
blurb: A hot new theme to spice up your workflow
description: This theme was actually inspired by the looks of my portfolio at https://bit.ly/husseinkizz-portifolio and it can really make your vscode look cool! ✌️

title: Mibo
blurb: Video chat that feels like real life
description: Mibo is video chat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.

title: The SMS Automation Template Library
blurb: SMS automation templates to grow your e-commerce brand.
description: One of the best-kept secrets in SMS e-commerce—campaigns aren’t the secret to SMS marketing success; SMS automations are. We’ve partnered with some of the worlds leading SMS agencies to create the SMS Automation Template Library to help brands grow.

title: Time Capsule
blurb: Transform your 2020 into a tiny, personalized book for free!
description: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!

title: FlipKit
blurb: Create your own flipbook animations
description: Bring your drawings to life and create your own flipbook animations with FlipKit! Whether you are a beginner or a professional, FlipKit provides you all the tools needed to start animating. Be inspired by one our fun examples.

title: Dish Dragon AI
blurb: Data science based ingredient pairing
description: The results of a survey of 150,000+ online recipes. Find ingredients that combine well or poorly or follow the 3d graph of interlinked ingredients. Also: find recipes based on the Dish Dragon's own scoring system, rather than questionable online review scores.

title: FAANG.io
blurb: FAANG engineering jobs in one spot.
description: FAANG engineering jobs, all in one spot!

title: Strongweek
blurb: Organise your To-Do list & reminders
description: A different way to organize your To-Do List or view iOS Reminders. A better tasks widget for your homescreen. Prioritize your to-do list with the weekly monthly yearly tasks planner app. Now with optional Reminders Sync, homescreen widgets, and iCloud backup.

title: Prospre
blurb: Generate custom meal plans with one click
description: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!

title: Paper Apps™ DUNGEON
blurb: Randomly generated notebook game
description: A procedurally-generated pencil and paper dungeon that you can easily carry in the back pocket of your jeans. Every book is unique, because each page is randomly generated. Levels are generated using Python and Drawbot to create a unique PDF for every copy.

title: LYMB.iO
blurb: Physical gaming console to motivate everybody to get active
description: LYMB.io is the first home fitness solution that keeps you active while you're focusing on fun. Our interactive system provides a variety of fitness classes and lots of entertaining games to develop and train physical and cognitive skills.
